=A0I tested H3.1.1 for this bug fix and I noticed that while the SURTs ar=
e no longer lost across checkpoint and 
resume, the two files "seeds.txt" a=
nd "surts.txt" are not generated for 
this (checkpoint and resume) run of t=
he job.
The two files are written for regular run of a job, though.

Did an=
yone else encounter this behavior as well?

Thanks,
Pranay
Crawl Engineer
L=
ibrary of Congress (Contractor)
